templates.text: I apologize, but I have a family obligation on {day} and will not be able to attend {event}.
I regret to inform you that a family matter requires my presence, and I cannot attend {event}.
Unfortunately, I must attend to a family commitment and will be unable to join {event}.
I must respectfully decline {event} due to a prior family engagement.
A family obligation prevents me from attending {event}. My sincere apologies.
I am unable to attend {event} as I have a family responsibility that requires my attention.
Due to family circumstances, I will not be able to make it to {event}.
I have a family engagement that conflicts with {event}. Please accept my apologies.

I apologize, but I will not be able to attend {event} on {day}. I have a family commitment that I must honor, and it would be inappropriate for me to miss it. I hope you understand, and I look forward to another opportunity to connect.

I regret to inform you that I will be unable to attend {event} on {day}. A family matter of some importance requires my presence, and I must prioritize this obligation. I hope we can arrange to meet at a more convenient time.
Thank you for the invitation to {event}. Unfortunately, I have a family gathering on {day} that I am expected to attend. I hope you understand my situation, and I would be delighted to reschedule.

I must respectfully decline your invitation to {event} on {day}. My family has planned an important occasion that requires my attendance. I hope this does not cause any inconvenience, and I look forward to future opportunities.
I am writing to express my regret that I cannot attend {event} on {day}. A family obligation has arisen that demands my presence. I value our relationship and hope we can find another time to meet.
Please accept my sincere apologies for being unable to attend {event}. I have a family commitment on {day} that I cannot postpone. I would be very pleased to arrange an alternative date.
I deeply regret that I must decline {event} on {day}. My family requires my presence for an important occasion. I hope you understand, and I would welcome the opportunity to reconnect soon.
Unfortunately, I will be occupied with family responsibilities on {day} and cannot attend {event}. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and hope we can find a suitable alternative.
I'm sorry, but I can't make it to {event}. I have a family thing I need to attend.
I won't be able to come to {event}. Got some family stuff going on.
Sorry, I have a family event on {day} so I can't make it to {event}.
I'm sorry but family comes first - I have to skip {event} this time.
I've got a family obligation that day, so I won't be able to attend {event}.
My family needs me on {day}, so I'll have to miss {event}. Sorry!
I'm tied up with family on {day}, won't be able to make {event}.
Can't come to {event} - I've got a family commitment. Hope you understand!
I have to be with my family on {day}. Sorry I'll miss {event}!
Family duties are calling - I can't make it to {event}. Sorry!
I'm really sorry, but I won't be able to come to {event} on {day}. I have a family gathering that I can't miss. I hope you understand! Let's definitely plan something soon.
I wish I could make it to {event} but my family has something planned for {day} that I really need to be at. Let's catch up another time soon!
Thanks for the invite to {event}! Unfortunately, I have a family commitment on {day} that I can't get out of. I'd love to reschedule when you're free!
I'm sorry but I have to miss {event}. My family is getting together on {day} and I really can't skip it. Can we find another day to hang out?
I hate to miss {event}, but my family needs me on {day}. You know how family can be! Let's definitely make plans for another time.
Sorry, I won't be able to make it to {event} on {day}. I've got a family thing that's been planned for a while. Hope you have a great time, and let's connect soon!
I really wanted to come to {event} but my mom/dad has something planned for {day} and I need to be there. Rain check? I'd love to catch up soon!
My family has a get-together on {day} that I promised to attend, so I'll have to miss {event}. I'm really sorry! Let's plan something for next week?
I can't make it to {event} this time. My grandparents are visiting on {day} and I really should be there. Let's definitely hang out soon though!
I'm so sorry but {event} falls on the same day as our family dinner. I can't miss it this time. Let's find another time to get together!
I wish I could be at {event} but we have a family thing happening on {day}. Super bummed to miss it! Can we reschedule?
My siblings are coming to town on {day} so I need to be with family instead of going to {event}. Hope you understand! Let's meet up soon.
Hey, can't make it. Got family stuff going on.
Gonna have to skip {event} - family time!
Can't come, fam needs me. Sorry!
Family thing on {day}, gotta pass on {event}.
No can do - family obligations. Next time!
Stuck with the fam on {day}. Catch ya later!
Parents are dragging me to a family thing. Can't escape!
Family stuff came up. Gonna miss {event}!
Got roped into family time. Sorry dude!
The fam needs me on {day}. Gotta bail on {event}.
Family duties call! Can't make {event}.
Mom's got plans for me on {day}. Sorry!
Hey, I really wish I could come to {event} but my family has this thing and I kinda have to be there. You know how it is! Let's catch up soon though!
Dude, I'm so bummed but I gotta skip {event}. Family stuff on {day} that I can't get out of. Let's hang next week!
Ugh, family is making me go to some thing on {day}. Gonna miss {event}. Total bummer. Let's do something soon!
My parents are hosting something on {day} and I gotta be there. Sorry I'll miss {event}! Rain check?
Family reunion stuff happening on {day} so I can't make it to {event}. Super annoying but what can you do! Let's hang soon.
Can't make {event} - got stuck with family plans on {day}. Would rather hang with you tbh! Next time for sure.
Hey! Wish I could come to {event} but the fam has dibs on me that day. Let's totally reschedule though!
My grandparents are visiting on {day} so I gotta be home. Going to miss {event} but let's catch up right after!
Family dinner is on {day} and I can't skip it. Sorry about {event}! Let me know when you're free next.
Got trapped into a family thing on {day}. Can't escape for {event}. Let's plan something for next weekend!
My aunt and uncle are coming over on {day} so the fam's got me locked down. Gonna miss {event} but hit me up later!
Family is doing their thing on {day} and I have to show face. Sorry about {event}! Let's definitely make plans soon.
I have been called to attend to a family matter and cannot be present at {event}.
A family situation requires my attention on {day}. I will be unable to attend {event}.
I appreciate the invitation to {event}. However, I have a family responsibility on {day} that takes precedence. I hope you understand my situation and we can connect at a later date.
Thank you for including me in {event}. Regrettably, I have a family function on {day} that I am obligated to attend. I would be happy to meet at another time that suits us both.
I've got family plans on {day} that I can't change. Sorry about {event}!
Need to be with family on {day}. Will miss {event} unfortunately.
I'm sorry I can't make it to {event}. We have relatives visiting on {day} and it's been planned for ages. Let's definitely catch up afterward!
My cousin's birthday is on {day} and the whole family is expected to be there. I'll have to miss {event} but I'd love to see you another time!
Relatives in town. Can't come to {event}!
It's family day on {day}. Gotta skip {event}.
My cousin is having a thing on {day} and my mom won't let me skip. Gonna miss {event} but let's hang soon!
Extended family is all coming over on {day}. It's a whole thing. Can't make {event} but count me in next time!
My family has requested my presence on {day}. I must decline {event}.
I must inform you that family obligations make it impossible for me to attend {event} on {day}. I deeply value this relationship and hope we can arrange an alternative meeting soon.
Family is visiting from out of town. Won't make it to {event}.
I have a family birthday celebration on {day} that I've committed to. Really sorry to miss {event}! Can we do something next week instead?
Birthday party for my nephew. Gotta skip {event}!
There's a birthday thing at my house on {day} for one of my relatives. Family first, ya know? Let's hang after!
My parents are having people over on {day}. Can't make {event}.
Mom and dad are hosting a family dinner on {day} and attendance is mandatory. I'll have to miss {event} this time. Let's reschedule!
Helping my parents with something on {day}. Missing {event}.
Gotta help my folks with a family thing on {day}. Annoying but necessary! Catch you at {event} next time.
I have a familial engagement on {day} that precludes my attendance at {event}.
It is with regret that I must decline {event}. My family has organized a gathering on {day}, and my presence is expected. I sincerely hope we can reschedule at your earliest convenience.
Taking care of a family member on {day}. Sorry about {event}!
I need to help my grandma with some things on {day}, so I won't be able to attend {event}. I hope to see you soon though!
Looking after my little sibling. Can't do {event}.
I'm babysitting duty on {day} because everyone else is busy. Can't make {event} but let's plan something soon!
We have a family anniversary celebration. Will miss {event}.
It's my parents' anniversary on {day} and we're doing a special dinner. I won't be able to make {event} but let's catch up soon!
Parents' anniversary dinner is on {day} and it's a big deal. Gonna miss {event} but hit me up for next time!
I must attend a family celebration on {day} honoring a significant milestone. I am therefore unable to join {event}. I trust you understand and hope to arrange an alternative time.
We're celebrating my sibling's graduation. Can't make {event}.
My sister's graduation is on {day} and the whole family is gathering. I really wish I could come to {event}! Let's plan something after.
Bro is graduating on {day} so I gotta be there. Missing {event} but let's do something after the weekend!
